Service Details: - Provides Social Insurance Number Card- A SIN card is a nine-digit number that is necessary to work in Canada or to have access to government programs and benefits- Face-to-face service at the Service Canada Kelowna office
How to Apply: - Forms available in person or on-line- Submit completed form to Kelowna Service Centre or by mail
